title: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Athletic Ticket Office FOIA Request (University of Maryland College Park)

communications.subject: Maryland Public Information Act Request: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Athletic Ticket Office FOIA Request (University of Maryland College Park)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Maryland Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any communications between employees of your state (whether it be .gov or .edu or any others) and between any entity using the eventellect.com URL in their email address such as sales@eventellect.com

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Mike Teller

communications.subject: 20240207; Request for Information, 66
communications.communication:
Good afternoon, Mr. Teller:

I hope this message reaches you. The MuckRock platform has been
historically unreliable. If you have a direct email address, please send.

You have reached the University of Maryland, College Park (UMCP).
We cannot search for records for the entire state. You will have to reach
out to each state agency individually.

Please advise whether you remain interested in only information
(potentially) from UMCP.
*We shall await your response.*

Finally, in Maryland, the law provides for a *30 *day window, not 10. We
are also permitted to request an extension should we need additional time
to process a request.

Sincerely,
Laura Anderson Wright

cc: Erika Chicas, Paralegal


On Wed, Feb 7, 2024 at 10:47 AM <158418-91083477@requests.muckrock.com>

communications.subject: RE: Maryland Public Information Act Request: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Athletic Ticket Office FOIA Request (University of Maryland College Park)
communications.communication: No proble,. My request is for communications between any of the following prestonr@umd.edu aspence6@umd.edu or bshelt24@umd.edu and anybody using the URL in their email eventellect.com . I would specify the years 2022 and 2023 for now. There should not pose a too broad or too burdensome request.
